neutral-subtle-hover.description: Light neutral background color hover state

neutral-subtle-active.description: Light neutral background color active state

brand-hover.description: Brand color for hover state of background

brand-active.description: Brand color for active state of background

brand-subtle-hover.description: Light brand color for background hover

brand-subtle-active.description: Light brand color for background active

brand-accent-1-hover.description: Brand accent 1 color for hover state of background

brand-accent-1-active.description: Brand accent 1 color for active state of background

brand-accent-2-hover.description: Brand accent 2 color for hover state of background

brand-accent-2-active.description: Brand accent 2 color for active state of background

brand-accent-2-subtle.description: Light brand accent 2 color for background

brand-accent-2-subtle-hover.description: Light brand accent 2 color for hover state of background

brand-accent-2-subtle-active.description: Light brand accent 2 color for active state of background

selected.description: Background color indicating a selected state

selected-hover.description: Background color indicating a selected hover state

selected-active.description: Background color indicating a selected active state

selected-subtle.description: Light color indicating a selected state

selected-subtle-hover.description: Light color indicating a selected hover state

selected-subtle-active.description: Light color indicating a selected active state

input-hover.description: Background color for hover state of inputs

input-active.description: Background color for active state of inputs

input-read-only.description: Background color for read-only state of inputs

regular.description: Default border color for UI elements

inverse.description: Inverse border color for UI elements

selected.description: Border color indicating a selected state

selected-hover.description: Border color indicating a selected hover state

selected-active.description: Border color indicating a selected active state

brand-hover.description: Brand color for hover state of border

brand-active.description: Brand color for active state of border

brand-accent-1-hover.description: Brand accent 1 color for hover state of border

brand-accent-1-active.description: Brand accent 1 color for active state of border

brand-accent-2-hover.description: Brand accent 2 color for hover state of border

brand-accent-2-active.description: Brand accent 2 color for active state of border

focus.description: Border color used to indicate focus state

focus-inverse.description: Border inverse color used to indicate focus state over a dark background

brand-hover.description: Brand color for hover state of text

brand-active.description: Brand color for active state of text

required.description: Color for indicating required action, an asterisk by default

hover.description: Color for hover state of link text

active.description: Color for active state of link text

visited.description: Color for visited state of link text

visited-hover.description: Color for visited hover state of link text

visited-active.description: Color for visited active state of link text

regular.description: Regular icon color matching regular text color

brand-hover.description: Brand action color for hover state of icon

brand-active.description: Brand action color for active state of icon

hover.description: Overlay to indicate hover state when a background color cannot change, such as images

active.description: Overlay to indicate active state when a background color cannot change, such as images

primary-hover.description: Primary background hover state for the UI

primary-active.description: Primary background active state for the UI

recessed.description: Secondary background for the UI often used for grouping items

raised.description: Primary background for cards that can be moved

raised-hover.description: Primary background hover state for cards that can be moved

raised-active.description: Primary background active state for cards that can be moved

overlay.description: Background for elements positioned above the UI such as modals, dropdown menus, dialogues, etc., as well as the background for cards that are in a dragged state

overlay-hover.description: Background hover state for elements positioned above the UI such as modals, dropdown menus, dialogues, etc., as well as the background for cards that are in a dragged state

overlay-active.description: Background active state for elements positioned above the UI such as modals, dropdown menus, dialogues, etc., as well as the background for cards that are in a dragged state

raised.description: Default shadow used for most components

overflow.description: Shadow used when content scrolls underneath a surface

regular.description: Border radius used by default across the UI
